reviewText: I've never seen a bad Richard Thomas movie.  I  shines in everything,  and is one of my favorites.  This film is no exception.
summary: Anything with Richard Thomas in it
Title: Death In Small Doses

reviewText: This movie was a good selection.  Richard Thomas was excellent in his character.  Its still hard for me to see him as a evil doer rather than that sweet, innocent kid on "The Waltons." I could watch this movie again.  Its a lifetime sunday movie.
